definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Unlike most other fish, they are monogamous and mate for life.
sentences.chinese: 不像其他的魚類，它們是一夫一妻制並終生廝守。

sentences.english: At the awards ceremony, the "Lifetime Achievement Award" went to Fu Zhengyi.
sentences.chinese: 在頒獎典禮上，傅正義獲得“終生成就獎”。

sentences.english: Learn is the enterprise of a lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 學習是一項終生的事業。

sentences.english: The girl for whom he had fought all his life no longer seemed important to him.
sentences.chinese: 他爲之而奮鬥終生的女孩對他來說似乎已不再重要。

sentences.english: The system of lifelong education needs perfecting.
When one treats the mushroom correctly, it thrives , germinates, and will accompany its owner for life.
sentences.chinese: 當正確處理菌菇，繁殖，發育，和陪伴主人終生。

sentences.english: At present, the idea of life_long education is not embodied in teacher education.
sentences.chinese: 我國目前的師資教育缺乏終生教育意識。

sentences.english: The members of our highest court are granted life tenure.
sentences.chinese: 我們最高法院的成員都是終生任期的。

sentences.english: As a right of a citizen, seif - defense isn t possessed for the whole life.
sentences.chinese: 正當防衛作爲公民的一項權利，並非終生享有的。

sentences.english: Losing you is my eternal regret.
sentences.chinese: 失去你是我終生的遺憾。

sentences.english: I learned a lesson in the reading-room that I will remember all my life.
sentences.chinese: 我在閱覽室裏學到一個終生難忘的教訓。

sentences.english: “I didn't participate, which I've regretted my entire life,” he said.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有參與，爲此我遺憾終生。

sentences.english: This is why Zhu Geliang felt remorse for the rest of his…
sentences.chinese: 這也是諸葛亮抱恨終生的底蘊所在。

sentences.english: One year free warranty, life-long service.
sentences.chinese: 一年免費保修，終生服務。

sentences.english: Ziyan and her parents will be grateful to you for life.
sentences.chinese: 紫嫣和她父母將終生感謝您。

sentences.english: Priests vowed their lives to the service of the church.
sentences.chinese: 教士們立誓終生爲教會服務。

definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
